  * `view-label` {`string`} - Display label, switch when hitting the toggle button

  * `view-mode` {`boolean`} - Which edit mode to display

tags.name: haxcms-site-builder
tags.description:
`haxcms-site-builder`
`build the site and everything off of this`

Events:

  * `outline-location-changed` - 

  * `manifest-changed` - 

  * `active-item-changed` - 

  * `active-item-content-changed` - 

  * `simple-toast-show` - 

  * `haxcms-ready` - 

  * `json-outline-schema-active-body-changed` - 

  * `json-outline-schema-changed` - 

Attributes:

  * `dashboard-opened` {`boolean`} - 

  * `manifest` - Manifest from file

  * `themeData` - Theme, used to boot a design element

  * `themeName` {`string`} - Theme name, which we then use to setup the theme

  * `activeItem` - Active item which is in JSON Outline Schema

  * `activeItemContent` {`string`} - Active item content

  * `file` {`string`} - Location of the site.json file

  * `baseURI` {`string`} - Injected by HAXcms

  * `queryParams` - queryParams

  * `loading` {`boolean`} - Loading status of the page to render.

  * `__imported` - Imported items so we can allow theme flipping dynamically

  * `theme-loaded` {`boolean`} - theme loaded to indicate to the theme we have a theme ready to go

  * `_timeStamp` {`string`} - 

  * `outline-location` {`string`} - support for alternate locations.

  * `active-item-location` {`string`} - 

Properties:

  * `dashboardOpened` {`boolean`} - 

  * `manifest` - Manifest from file

  * `themeData` - Theme, used to boot a design element

  * `themeName` {`string`} - Theme name, which we then use to setup the theme

  * `activeItem` - Active item which is in JSON Outline Schema

  * `activeItemContent` {`string`} - Active item content

  * `file` {`string`} - Location of the site.json file

  * `baseURI` {`string`} - Injected by HAXcms

  * `__disposer` {`never[]`} - 

  * `queryParams` - queryParams

  * `loading` {`boolean`} - Loading status of the page to render.

  * `__imported` - Imported items so we can allow theme flipping dynamically

  * `themeLoaded` {`boolean`} - theme loaded to indicate to the theme we have a theme ready to go

  * `_timeStamp` {`string`} - 

  * `outlineLocation` {`string`} - support for alternate locations.

  * `activeItemLocation` {`string`} -

tags.name: haxcms-site-dashboard

`haxcms-site-dashboard`

  * `haxcms-load-site-dashboard` - 

Attributes:

  * `dashboard-opened` {`boolean`} - 

  * `method` {`string`} - Allow method to be overridden, useful in local testing

  * `jwt` {`string`} - JSON Web token, it'll come from a global call if it's available

  * `publishing` {`boolean`} - Publishing end point, this has CDN implications so show message

  * `manifest` - Outline of items in json outline schema format

  * `jwt` {`string`} - JSON Web token, it'll come from a global call if it's available

  * `publishing` {`boolean`} - Publishing end point, this has CDN implications so show message

  * `manifest` - Outline of items in json outline schema format

  * `__disposer` {`never[]`} -

`site-children-block`

Attributes:

  * `dynamic-methodology` {`string`} - How we should obtain the parent who's children we should show
options are direct, above, or root

  * `start` {`number`} - starting level for the menu items

  * `end` {`number`} - ending level for the menu items

  * `parent` {`string`} - parent for the menu id

  * `fixed-id` {`boolean`} - Use this boolean to force this to fix to 1 parent
Otherwise it will dynamically update (default behavior)

  * `noink` {`boolean`} - to control ink on the buttons

  * `__items` {`any[]`} - just to bind data between things

  * `active-id` {`string`} - acitvely selected item

tags.name: site-query-menu-slice
tags.description:
`site-query-menu-slice`
`A slice / 1 level within the hierarchy, via relative parent or deep parent`

Events:

  * `result-changed` - 

Attributes:

  * `parent` {`string`} - parent for the menu id

  * `result` {`any[]`} - Results which can be binded to something else

  * `_router-manifest` - 

  * `start` {`number`} - starting level for the menu items

  * `end` {`number`} - ending level for the menu items

  * `dynamic-methodology` {`string`} - How we should obtain the parent who's children we should show
options are active, parent, or ancestor

  * `fixed-id` {`boolean`} - Use this boolean to force this to fix to 1 parent
Otherwise it will dynamically update (default behavior)

  * `no-dynamic-level` {`boolean`} - Allow disabling the dynamic leveling

Properties:

  * `parent` {`string`} - parent for the menu id

  * `end` {`number`} - ending level for the menu items

options are active, parent, or ancestor

  * `noDynamicLevel` {`boolean`} - Allow disabling the dynamic leveling

tags.name: site-top-menu

`site-top-menu`

Attributes:

  * `manifest` - manifest of everything, in case we need to check on children of parents

  * `active-id` {`string`} - acitvely selected item

  * `sticky` {`boolean`} - visually stick to top of interface at all times

  * `indicator` {`string`} - visualize the indicator as a a line, arrow, or not at all

  * `noink` {`boolean`} - ink on the buttons

  * `notitle` {`boolean`} - hide title on the buttons

  * `showindex` {`boolean`} - ink on the buttons

  * `arrow-size` {`number`} - Stupid but faster then calculating on the fly for sure

  * `sort` - Allow customization of sort

  * `conditions` - Allow customization of the conditions if needed

  * `mobile-title` {`string`} - 

  * `edit-mode` {`boolean`} -
